item.description:
Colt State Park is considered to be one of the best parks in Rhode Island with its beautiful views, and what better opportunity to check it out?

Web Site: http://www.riparks.co...

Matt has reserved 2 park sites for us. This includes 2 fireplaces and 4 picnic tables [Tables 8 and 9 on the map].

Check out the park map: http://www.riparks.co...

Please bring something to share with others. When you RSVP, it would be helpful to write what you plan on bringing in the comments section...

Some ideas are:

  • Appetizers
  • Salads
  • Chips & Dip
  • Sides
  • Paper Plates
  • Napkins
  • Plasticware
  • Soda
  • Games


Directions from Providence: Take Interstate Rte.195 East, to Exit 2, Rte.114 South, to Hope Street in Bristol. [about 30 minute drive]
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup Signs on Picnic Tables 10 and 11
item.name: End of Summer Picnic Potluck @ Colt State Park
